title: Cookobio
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small restaurant with a few big tables in an old room that previously was a bakery. Then you have just to come in, sit at the table, order your wine (or anything else like water or herbal teas) and wait for Marilu's preparation. Usually is a four/five courses menù (from starters to dessert) with some possible tasting of extra small portion which you will be requested to give an opinion for future guest. They don't have a menù list, but the dishes will be presented to you at your arrival. Call ahead to let her know your requirements.
